ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[rpt_GetContacts]
AS BEGIN
select cast('var contacts = {'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id_contact as nvarchar(10) )+' : {' +'name:'''+ REPLACE ( fullName , '''' , '\''' )+'''' +', mng_id:'''+ REPLACE ( isnull(employe_id, '') , '''' , '\''' )+'''' +', mainMng_id:'''+ REPLACE ( isnull(mainManager_id,'') , '''' , '\''' )+'''' +', region_id:'''+ REPLACE ( isnull(region_id,'') , '''' , '\''' )+'''' +', firstLevel_id:'''+ REPLACE ( isnull(firstLevel_id, '') , '''' , '\''' )+'''' +', category_id:'''+ REPLACE ( isnull(category_id, '') , '''' , '\''' )+''''
+'}' from ent_Contacts FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'}; var employee={'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id as nvarchar(10))+' : '''+ Name +'''' from ent_Employe FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'}; var users={'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id as nvarchar(10))+' : '''+ Name +'''' from ent_MainManagers FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'}; var firstLevel={'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id as nvarchar(10))+' : '''+ name +'''' from ent_FirstLevels FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'}; var category={'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id as nvarchar(10))+' : '''+ name +'''' from ent_ContactCategory FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'}; var regions={'+ (select stuff( (select ','+ cast(id as nvarchar(10))+' : '''+ replace(name, '''','') +'''' from ent_Regions FOR XML PATH('')),1,1,'') ) +'};;;;' as text)
END
